title: LF 5v5 flex team and clash team
body:
hello guys/girls

i want to join people that wanna play 5v5 flex and hopefully play clash too coz its hard to get past the first round if its everyones first time playing together.
i am a mid main i can play vel ori gp malz morg and a bit more champs but can play all other roles well enough for ranked.\
i have discord and working mic.
i am currently gold 4 in solo and s3 in flex
feel free to add me on league 

cheers everyone
